msg.msgText:
A "RemoteLogServer" composite object can be deleted by using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command. The "RemoteLogServer" composite object defines the settings that are used for forwarding MessageSight log messages to a remote syslog server.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete RemoteLogServer help
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete RemoteLogServer

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
